Package org.subethamail.smtp.helper

Interface Summary
SimpleMessageListener This is an interface for processing the end-result messages that is higher-level than the MessageHandler and related factory.
SmarterMessageListener This is an interface for processing the end-result messages that is higher-level than the MessageHandler and related factory but lower-level than SimpleMessageListener.
SmarterMessageListener.Receiver Interface which accepts delivery of a message.
 

Class Summary
SimpleMessageListenerAdapter MessageHandlerFactory implementation which adapts to a collection of MessageListeners.
SmarterMessageListenerAdapter MessageHandlerFactory implementation which adapts to a collection of SmarterMessageListeners.
